name: FSX GPS 1000 (Garmin version)
description:
Do you own FSX? Do you want to use your device as a second screen to get vital flight information on the go.

- Shows Heading
- Shows Bank
- Shows Pitch of Airplane
- Shows Speed and Altitude
- Shows Communication Frequencies

If you want to use it with your own flight, download the free client from www.positiongames.com.

This app is for flight simulation only. Not to be used for real flights.
